description:
this is great, it's nice to have microsoft apps on ubuntu it could mean more people come to ubuntu, i think you have done a great job here.
keep it going.

the app is ugly and just a copy of the web application. I don't actually know, why to use this one if I can get the same interface, but more adjustable, from the Chrome. The beauty of this app is far away from the the Windows / MacOS Mircosoft To-Do apps.

Thanks for the app.
It is nice to have it as a separate app even though it is not supported by Microsoft.

Great thanks to the developers as the app does work and you can use it. 
Still, there are some bugs. After two days of use I found out these: 
- synchronization of tasks with steps can go wrong as each step is shown twice
- searching function is not working
- calendar starts always with Sunday and I did not find a way to change it - which is pretty interesting because if you press the deadline key to "next week" it jumps to the next Monday, not Sunday
- some small GUI bugs. 

Since it's only a 0.6 version I'm looking forward to these issues being fixed
Wep App perfecta. poco mas que añadir
不支持中文输入法输入。not support chinese sougo input in the app.
summary: not support chinese sougo input in the app
